data.message:
Now everybody is talking bad about this song
Let's face it 
This song is amazing 
Em was so damn good 
But all these people hating on this for two main reasons
First one most of the haters are trump supporters 
Second people think that Em is still in his mid 20s and on drugs
Em is mature now accept it 
He is so good he is just not like the old days
He may be better for some people but most people find he is becoming weak cuz he decreased the amount of violence in his music 
Accept it folks!!

replies.message: Evan Gallette you don’t know what ‘matured’ means, do you?

I agree Eminem is allowed to live a free life to his own it would be really upsetting having so many people bugging all the time.  You know what Eminem the people are off your lawn now you can actually grow some fresh grass and plants to breathe oxygen again.  When doors close it doesn't mean you failed.  It happens for a reason and is a blessing In disguise. Trust me.. Don't believe the lie that to be worthy everyone has to like you.  There are slot of lost and negative people out there.  It's bot your responsibility to make them happy it's their own responsibility. But you can help so many in need in big or small ways who will genuinely appreciate you for being a real person..the Bible says to always give in. Secret and never let your left hand see what your right hand is giving.  Because our creator sees all that is in secret.  The people who give righteously and them want to be known and applauded they have already received their reward which is the applaud but when giving in secret Tue Lord stores up your rewards and treasures in heaven.  I believe this because it produces fruit of Love and where there is love you cant fault nor steer wrong.  That's why I am a believer because I see the results and produce of believing is positive. You can't fault positive can you.
